definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: He has studied German for two years .
When I was learning German, there was a cartoon very cute.
sentences.chinese: 我以前學德文的時候，看過一則漫畫很有趣。

sentences.english: He took up lodgings at 4 Clarence Baths in Devonport.
sentences.chinese: 他在德文波特克拉倫斯澡堂4號住下。
她拒絕了侯德文的建議。

sentences.english: Hirst lives and works in Devon and London.
sentences.chinese: 現於德文郡及倫敦生活和工作。

sentences.english: One lovely spot is Hembury Woods in the Dart Valley, Devon.
sentences.chinese: 一個最佳觀賞去處是德文郡達特山谷的亨百麗森林。

sentences.english: Is it true, pray? for of course you must know, as you have beenin Devonshire so lately.
sentences.chinese: 你當然應該知道啦，因爲你不久前還呆在德文郡。

sentences.english: Since the invasion of the German, my teacher would never teach German for anything.
sentences.chinese: 德國人入侵以後，我的老師死也不肯再教德文了。

sentences.english: In the German-speaking areas, German is the lingua franca.
sentences.chinese: 在德語區內，通用的是德文與德語。

sentences.english: He was a judge himself, working mostly in Devonshire.
sentences.chinese: 他本人也是一名法官，主要在德文夏工作。

sentences.english: That is why he moved to Devonshire when the school closed.
sentences.chinese: 那就是他在學校關閉之後搬到德文郡的原因所在。

sentences.english: Devon Rex is a great hairless cat.
sentences.chinese: 德文捲毛貓是一種很好的無毛貓種。

sentences.english: Certainly one German bomber landed voluntarily in Devonshire.
sentences.chinese: 的確曾有一架德國轟炸機自動地在德文郡降落。

sentences.english: that all editors of, and contributors to newspapers appearing in the German language must be members of the nation;
sentences.chinese: 凡以德文出版的報紙的編輯和投稿人必須是德國人。

sentences.english: Remarkably, Harbisson chose to study art when he moved to Devon.
sentences.chinese: 當哈比森搬到德文郡時，他選擇去學習美術。

sentences.english: The German county's resident expressed that admires to Barnet's fortuitous encounter.
sentences.chinese: 德文郡的居民則表示對巴尼特的奇遇豔羨不已。

definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
